a religion that originally came from India, and that teaches that all living things should be treated with care and respect: Jainism has nearly four million followers. In the holy places of Jainism, you must remove your shoes and any other leather you may be wearing. Related word
Jain
More examplesFewer examplesThe concept of Nirvana is also used in other Indian religions, notably Jainism.Jainism stresses pure thinking and moral behaviour.Unlike in Hinduism, God has no role to play in Jainism as a dispenser of karmas.
